              [
                " | Specifies that the script shall be executed asynchronously (only for external scripts). This attribute does not require any value (except of XHTML). |"

              [
                " | Specifies that the script shall be executed when the page has finished parsing (only for external scripts). This attribute does not require any value (except of XHTML). |"
